content: the mosaic hearts hat is just right when you re craving a quick crochet project that still feels extra special it s fun to stitch easy to wear and makes a sweet handmade hat for chilly winter days or anytime you want to add a little warmth and love to someone s wardrobe this hat is worked overlay mosaic crochet in the round with a simple heart design that keeps things interesting without feeling overwhelming a pom pom on top adds a bit of playful personality this hat is a fun and satisfying make that comes in four sizes so you can make one for everyone in the family the pattern comes with written instructions and a chart as well as link to video tutorials for mosaic crochet and other stitches and techniques used in the pattern unique features- great for adventurous beginners beautiful heart design worked in overlay mosaic crochet fun pom pom adds a whimsical touch perfect gift idea for valentine s day or just because materials needed- yarn worsted weight approx 200 yards each of 2 colors hook 5 0mm us size h/8 scissors gauge 16 stitches x 20 rounds = 4 square obtained from swatch of pattern measuring on the ws
